settings.googleNewsConfigError: Failed to save Google News configuration
settings.publishOssConfigDesc: This configuration option is primarily used for scheduled monitoring to verify that documents are correctly published to the object storage configured for social platforms. Typical scenario: articles are collected in the Singapore region and synchronized to the domestic region through object storage for publishing. If 'Use Same as Storage' is enabled, the social article object storage configuration will be used.
settings.useSameAsStorageDesc: If enabled, the social article object storage configuration will be used. If disabled, you can configure an independent publish object storage.

alertRule.title: Alert Rule
alertRule.subtitle: Configure alert rule for {provider}
alertRule.enableDesc: Whether to enable this alert rule
alertRule.costThresholdDesc: Trigger alert when billing amount exceeds this value
alertRule.growthThresholdDesc: Trigger alert when billing growth percentage exceeds this value
alertRule.growthAmountThresholdDesc: Trigger alert when billing growth amount exceeds this value
alertRule.note: At least one threshold (cost threshold, growth percentage threshold, or growth amount threshold) must be set
alertRule.atLeastOneThreshold: At least one threshold must be set

strategy.title: Strategy
strategy.subtitle: Choose how to select among multiple enabled global configs, and how failures are handled.
strategy.multiModelNote: When multiple global configs are enabled (by order), the following applies:
strategy.failureBehaviorFirst: First: Always use the first active config (lowest order). If that call fails, the request fails immediately — no automatic fallback to the next config.
strategy.failureBehaviorRoundRobin: Round-robin: Each new request uses the next config in order. If a call fails, that request fails; the next request will use the next config in the rotation.

config.noGlobalConfigs: No global configs. Add one below.

channels.title: Notification Channels
channels.subtitle: Manage notification channels (Webhook and email SMTP); add multiple and set default.
channels.noChannels: No channels yet. Click Add Channel to create one.
channels.name: Name
channels.orderDesc: The active channel with the smallest order value is used for sending; smaller value = higher priority, same value uses creation time.
channels.messagePrefixDesc: Prepended to the message body when sending; some platforms require a source identifier.
channels.signSecretPlaceholder: Optional; required when Feishu bot has signature verification enabled
channels.signSecretDesc: When Feishu custom bot has signature verification enabled, paste the secret here; requests will be signed automatically.
channels.mergeEnabledDesc: Merge multiple notifications with the same key within the time window.
channels.mergeWindowMinutesDesc: 0 = no merge; use with Enable merge when > 0.
channels.fromNameDesc: Display name shown to recipients; if empty, only the email address is shown.
channels.subjectPrefixDesc: Prepended to the email subject when sending, to identify the source.
channels.validateEmailDialogDesc: Enter the recipient email to receive a test message, or leave empty to only test SMTP connection.
channels.testRecipientEmailDesc: Optional. If filled, a test email will be sent to this address; otherwise only SMTP connection is tested.
channels.silenceWindowMinutesDesc: Same alert will not be sent again within this period (only once); 0 means no silence.
channels.isActiveDesc: When off, this channel will not be used for sending.
channels.setDefaultDesc: Use this channel when no channel is specified.

settings.title: Notification Settings
settings.subtitle: Notification module schedule and cleanup config (admin)
settings.retentionDesc: Keep notification records for this many days; cleanup task deletes older ones.
settings.cleanupDesc: Run cleanup at the cron schedule below to remove expired records.
settings.crontabHelp: Five-field cron: minute hour day month weekday, e.g. 0 2 * * * = daily at 02:00.

form.name: Task Name
form.taskTypeHelp: Select the type of scheduled task to execute
form.dayOfMonthHelp: Day of month (1-31), comma-separated for multiple, * for every day
form.dayOfMonthInvalid: Day of month must be a number between 1-31, comma-separated for multiple
form.monthOfYearHelp: Month (1-12), comma-separated for multiple, * for every month
form.monthOfYearInvalid: Month must be a number between 1-12, comma-separated for multiple
form.dayOfWeekHelp: Day of week (0-7, both 0 and 7 mean Sunday), comma-separated for multiple, * for every week
form.dayOfWeekInvalid: Day of week must be a number between 0-7, comma-separated for multiple
form.timezoneDescription: Tasks will be scheduled according to your local timezone ({timezone})
form.socialAccountHelp: Used to distinguish article storage paths when publishing to different social media accounts (e.g., toutiao_ai, weibo_user)
form.transformFormatsHelp: Select one or more formats to generate for published articles
form.transformFormatsRequired: Please select at least one publish format
form.keywordsOrTopicsRequired: Please provide at least keywords or topics
form.keywordsOrTopicsOnlyOne: You can only select either keywords or topics, not both
form.atLeastOneKeyword: Please enter at least one keyword
form.maxProjectsHelp: Maximum number of projects to collect (default: 20, max: 100). Actual count may be less as GitHub trending page has a fixed number of projects
form.minuteHelp: Minute (0-59), comma-separated for multiple, * for every minute
form.minuteInvalid: Minute must be a number between 0-59, comma-separated for multiple
form.hourHelp: Hour (0-23), comma-separated for multiple, * for every hour
form.hourInvalid: Hour must be a number between 0-23, comma-separated for multiple
form.alertTaskMinuteHelp: Alert task restriction: Only a single minute value (0-59) is allowed, e.g., 5 means execute at the 5th minute of every hour
form.alertTaskHourHelp: Alert task restriction: Must execute every hour, only */1 or * is allowed
form.alertTaskMinuteInvalid: Alert tasks can only set a single minute value (0-59), wildcards, ranges, or comma-separated values are not allowed
form.alertTaskHourInvalid: Alert tasks must execute every hour, hour field can only be set to */1 or *
form.startTimeHelp: Task will start from this time, default is current time
form.previewEveryHour: Execute at {minute} minutes past every hour
form.previewScheduleWithDay: Execute on day {dayOfMonth} at {minute} minutes past {hours}
form.previewScheduleWithMonth: Execute in month {monthOfYear} at {minute} minutes past {hours}
form.previewScheduleFull: Execute on day {dayOfMonth} of month {monthOfYear}, on {dayOfWeek}, at {minute} minutes past {hours}
form.enabledHelp: When enabled, the task will automatically execute according to the schedule rules
form.nameAutoGenerated: Task name will be auto-generated based on selected parameters
form.nameAutoGeneratedHelp: Task name will be automatically generated based on keywords, topics, region, language and schedule time
form.startTimeDisplayHelp: Start time defaults to current time, task will start from this time
